div.p: These pages contain historical views of the metadata information for the HL7 entries for external code systems that have been retired at some time in the past, and have been published in the HL7 Terminology pages. This content was the HL7 record of some of the information about an External Terminology, but has been retired and/or superceded at some time in the past.
Retirement has been indicated by the HL7 community and/or the owner/publisher of the Code System and indicates that it is no longer active.
